answers.answer:
Yes, free transportation is available for all people fleeing Ukraine, specifically from the Ukrainian-Moldovan border to Romania, supported by the Romanian and Moldavian governments, UNHCR, and IOM. These services include daily buses from Palanca border in Moldova to Huși in Romania, with onward free buses to Bucharest or Iasi.

To find more detailed information, please visit the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine.
